Most popular among drivers in PA

content.body:
### Shop 235/50R17 Tire Size The 235/50R17 tire size has fallen out of favor somewhat but it’s still one that can be found on vehicles like the Buick LaCrosse, Honda Odyssey, Lexus GS and older models of the Honda CR-V, Dodge Grand Caravan and Hyundai Sonata. Most drivers prefer all-season tires since they offer a great balance of ride quality, low noise, predictable handling and year-round traction, even in light snow and slush. Some of our recommendations for premium all-season tires in the 235/50R17 size include the Bridgestone DriveGuard, BFGoodrich Advantage Control, [Kumho Solus TA71](https://simpletire.com/brands/kumho-tires/solus-ta71), and Nokian One. Popular vehicles: 2012-2014 Buick LaCrosse
1999-2021 Honda Odyssey
1993-2019 Lexus GS
1997-2006 Honda CR-V
1988-2000 Dodge Grand Caravan
2004-2008 Hyundai Sonata If you’re driving a sporty sedan or crossover and like to push the handling envelope a little, ultra-high-performance (UHP) tires can be a good call. UHP tires feature a softer, stickier tread formulation that really hangs in on corners, as well as an optimized tread pattern. We’d recommend premium UHP tires like the [Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus), Michelin Pilot Sport All Season 4, Yokohama Advan Sport V105, and Firestone Firehawk Indy 500. For areas of the country that have hard winters, all-season tires often just can’t get the job done in deeper snow and slush. If that describes where you live, consider dedicated winter tires; they feature a more aggressive tread design with sipes to dig in and boost traction in snow, as well as a softer rubber formulation that stays flexible in sub-freezing weather. Check out tires like the Continental VikingContact 7, [Pirelli W240 SottoZero Serie II](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/w240-sottozero-serie-ii), Nokian Hakkapeliitta 10, or Toyo Observe GSi-6 HP. Just remember to change your winter tires when the thermometer gets above about 40 degrees, as that softer rubber wears quickly in warmer weather. Whether you drive a Buick LaCrosse, Honda Odyssey, Lexus GS, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 235/50R17 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
